ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | spcimgf.1 | |- F/_ x A |
| 2 |  | spcimgf.2 | |- F/ x ps |
| 3 |  | spcimegf.3 | |- ( x = A -> ( ps -> ph ) ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_nfn | |- F/ x -. ps |
| 5 | 3 | #P_con3d | |- ( x = A -> ( -. ph -> -. ps ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_spcimgf | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x -. ph -> -. ps ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_con2d | |- ( A e. V -> ( ps -> -. A. x -. ph ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-ex | |- ( E. x ph <-> -. A. x -. ph ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl6ibr | |- ( A e. V -> ( ps -> E. x ph ) ) |
